res:
The error "ERROR 1040 (HY000): Too many connections" that you are encountering indicates that the maximum number of connections that the MySQL server can handle simultaneously has been reached. This limit is controlled by the `max_connections` parameter in MySQL. To resolve this issue, you can increase the value of `max_connections` in your MySQL configuration file (typically `my.cnf` or `my.ini`), which will allow more simultaneous connections to the server.

Recommended parameter to adjust:
```json
["max_connections"]
```
